mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FD_ERRORCHECK_ADDRESS WHERE ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM FD_ERRORCHECK_ADDRESS t WHERE TO_CHAR ( t.SIGNTIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd' ) <= TO_CHAR ( SYSDATE - 4, 'yyyy-MM-dd' ) AND ROWNUM < 501 )
mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM FD_ERRORCHECK_ADDRESS t WHERE TO_CHAR ( t.SIGNTIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd' ) <= TO_CHAR ( SYSDATE - 4, 'yyyy-MM-dd' ) AND ROWNUM < 1
